snippet.title: The Chair Dance - Lively Chair Simulator Official Low Quality Trailer
snippet.description:
While testing my new game (Lively Chair Simulator), my chair decided to have a dance and I recorded it. Since Chair is dancing without music, I am not adding any music to the video.

Introducing the game...
Lively Chair Simulator is a game with freaky controls. In the game, you are moving a chair by controlling each of the legs of the chair individually. There are different abilities between chairs. In the video, he is the starter chair. He can kick with his front legs.

If you are interested in the game, you can add it to your wishlist on Steam now.
